title: Beef Stew
steps:
1. Brown the beef in a pot.
2. Add chopped vegetables and sauté briefly.
3. Cover with water and simmer until tender.
4. Season to taste and serve.

title: Canele
steps:
1. Prepare the batter and let it rest overnight.
2. Preheat the oven and grease canele molds.
3. Pour the batter into the molds.
4. Bake until dark and caramelized.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken, curry powder, coconut milk, rice
steps:
1. Cook the chicken until browned.
2. Add curry powder and stir well.
3. Pour in coconut milk and simmer.
4. Serve with rice.

title: Classic Spaghetti
steps:
1. Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
2. Cook the beef until browned.
3. Add tomato sauce and simmer.
4. Serve over spaghetti.

title: Macarons
ingredients: almond flour, sugar powder, egg white, granulated sugar
steps:
1. Whip egg whites until stiff peaks form.
2. Fold in almond flour and powdered sugar.
3. Pipe onto a baking sheet and let rest.
4. Bake and fill with ganache or buttercream.

title: Vegetable Combo
ingredients: broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, soy sauce
steps:
1. Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
2. Stir-fry in a hot pan with a bit of oil.
3. Add soy sauce and mix well.
4. Serve warm.
